body_html:
One thing you might be able to do is build the static or shared library with Bazel and then link that into your OS X project. If this does not work, please let us know, and we'll reopen the issue.

We appreciate you reporting this issue, but please take into consideration that the contrib/makefile build system is community supported on StackOverflow. Although we will happily review any PRs improving it.
body_text:
One thing you might be able to do is build the static or shared library with Bazel and then link that into your OS X project. If this does not work, please let us know, and we'll reopen the issue.
We appreciate you reporting this issue, but please take into consideration that the contrib/makefile build system is community supported on StackOverflow. Although we will happily review any PRs improving it.
body:
One thing you might be able to do is build the static or shared library with Bazel and then link that into your OS X project. If this does not work, please let us know, and we'll reopen the issue.

We appreciate you reporting this issue, but please take into consideration that the contrib/makefile build system is community supported on [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow). Although we will happily review any PRs improving it.
